content.text: Match ends, Villarreal 1, Real Madrid 3.
Second Half ends, Villarreal 1, Real Madrid 3.
Goal!  Villarreal 1, Real Madrid 3. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) from a free kick with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Foul by Carlos Marchena (Villarreal).
Ángel Di María (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
